mapper.select: select sm.sid, sm.score, st.studentName, su.subjectName, em.eid, em.applyEnd, em.applyStart from score_manage sm inner join apply_message am on sm.applyManageId = am.aid inner join student st on am.studentId = st.sid inner join subject su on am.subjectId = su.sid inner join exam_manage em on am.examManageId = em.eid where sm.sid = #{sid}
mapper.update:
update score_manage sm inner join apply_message am on sm.applyManageId = am.aid inner join student st on am.studentId = st.sid inner join subject su on am.subjectId = su.sid inner join exam_manage em on am.examManageId = em.eid
sm.score = #{score},
st.studentName = #{studentName},
su.subjectName = #{subjectName},
em.applyStart = #{applyStart},
em.applyEnd = #{applyEnd}
where sm.sid = #{sid}
